EmailTemplate.description: This is Draft - Please DO NOT USE
EmailTemplate.name: Final Contact Resolved
EmailTemplate.subject: <Placeholder>
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
I want to thank you again for your time and allowing me to assist you with your issue.
If you experience any further issues with this or anything else, please reach out to our Accountant team at 888-333-3451 and one of our experienced care representatives will be able to assist you!
Thank you! {!Case.OwnerFullName} Accountant Care Specialist
Please complete the survey if the opportunity presents itself. If you did not receive a survey but would like to provide feedback on my performance, please email my manager directly at Sean_Randall@Intuit.com
